## useHelpOnMount() function

Request help when a component renders

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useHelpOnMount(key: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The help key to request |
